metadata.title: CVE-2022-48565 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An XML External Entity (XXE) issue was discovered in Python through 3.9.1.The plistlib module no longer accepts entity declarations in XML plistfiles to avoid XML vulnerabilities.

criterions.comment: python2.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python3.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
